Posts.Content: I have been on Kadcyla since July 2017 and have never had Dex, I specifically said I didn’t want it as it has made me feel absolutely dreadful over the years. I only have paracetamol and an anti sickness as pre meds then Kadcyla over 30 minutes x
Posts.Title: Dexamethasone and chemo

Posts.Content: Yes I was diagnosed with lung mets in February 2013, so 6 years ago. Am well and active and stable on Kadcyla x
Posts.Title: anyone with a secondary breast cancer in lungs ?

Posts.Content: I was on it for two years it kept me stable all that time. I will not lie the hand/foot (feet mostly) side effects were not great. I would recommend wearing something like Skechers Go Walk and moisturise as much as you can. It is otherwise a very doable chemo certainly easier than the taxanes x
Posts.Title: How to cope with side effects of Xeloda
